Headline: CNN 10 - March 24, 2020
Article_Body: March 24, 2020 While the U.S. Congress and Federal Reserve take steps to try to limit the economic damage from the coronavirus pandemic, individual states take steps to try to keep Americans from spreading the disease. Meantime, sports fans turn to events like marble racing to quench their thirst for competition, and the Northern Lights put on a spectacular show over Lapland.
